divs: sighting detailsi was in the usaf with a fighter tactical wing, and early lauch detection sights, i know what air craft look like during the night or day. this was not any air craft that i have ever seen. there was no lights such as tail or wing lights. the entire surface was a soft glo amber\yellow almost peach color. the object was moving from s to nw and paulsed for a few secounds then moved on at a high rate of speed.
Summary: Object was moving from south to north hovered for a few secounds then moved towards north, object was soccer shaped and picked towards center. Object color was amber to light yellowish orange or peach.
